page.title: 13Events - transport, health
page.content: The new road through Church linking Accrington with the M65 was opened recently. Traffic lights have been installed where the road crosses Dill Hall Lane. 270000 pounds has been spent this year on replacing an 80 year old sewer. The new 75 cm pipes will carry more sewerage and will prevent overflows which used to pollute the River Hyndburn. The extra capacity will allow the area to be developed further. The Elderly Sick and Mentally Infirm are now catered for in the new E.S.M.I. unit at Accrington Victoria Hospital. The children's ward has not been so lucky however - it has been closed down.
